main event: A bright white object the size of a basketball was observed hovering in the sky for 2 hours and 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as bright white and could appear much larger than it was,The observation was civilian and lasted for over 2 hours,The object was possibly a balloon, an aircraft, or astronomical in nature,It was noted that there was no physical evidence of the object following the observation,The sighting occurred on a clear day with slight wind conditions.
witness description: Mrs. Mis West, 55 years old, trained supervisor
